TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. However, the wishes you made of that particular type can no longer be typed.

I wish for spider lotion.

Granted, I give you lotion that turns you into a spider. Not a spiderman spider... a daddy long legs that I promptly swat.

I wish for the ability to make "next poster" wishes.

Granted, however all wishes catch on fire.

I wish for a pet death raptor.

Granted, but it dies.

I wish for a competent, non-food, sentient, reasonably-priced lawyer.

Granted, however he is bribed into making you lose by the opposing party.

I wish for a space rock.

Granted, it's incoming to your backyard at 20km/s.

I wish to actually see the Kraken, not only its effects. It kinda reminds me of the Cthulhu mythos...

Granted. It moons you. Interpret that as you will.

I wish for a competent, non-food, sentient, reasonably-priced lawyer with an ethical code of conduct.

Granted, but no one takes him seriously.

I wish for a blunt weapon.

Granted, but its all broken

I wish a fart

Granted... you get a Flying Acrobatic Retarded Trapezeist

I wish for BR to disappear forever! Mwahahaha

Granted. But your disappear, too.

I wish for a competent, non-food, sentient, reasonably-priced lawyer with an ethical code of conduct who is taken seriously.

Granted, but he dies within the first hour.

I wish for good stuff to happen, and nothing terrible.

Granted, but it happens to everyone you hate.

I wish for nothing in particular.

Granted. You bring forth The Nothing and get swallowed into the darkness.

I wish that all the wishes wished in this thread would actually be granted exactly as the wish-granter wrote.

Granted - all the wishes wished in this thread would actually be granted exactly as the wish-granter wrote. Also the thread becomes very boring.

I wish for literally a potato.

Granted, but it has a gun, and you are gonna squish it when it pulls out its gun.

I want to be a pie (still with asdf movie? I need to get a life)!

Granted. But you are a cow pie

I wish for a competent, non-food, sentient, reasonably-priced lawyer with an ethical code of conduct who is taken seriously and has a normal lifespan.

Granted, unfortunately when you reveal your crime to your lawyer she turns against you and submits her testimony as evidence to the court.

I wish there was a simple and easy way to get people to abandon ideology they hold dear and seek out their own ideology as an individual.

Errr... There is? It is called 'using one's brain'.

I mean: Granted. It gets patented by Apple and sold as an optional upgrade to the new iPhone. Noone installs it.

I wish wouldn't have overlooked an obvious bad and loosing move in yesterdays chess game.

Granted. You are now a chess computer.

I wish for 20 rock stars.

Granted. You get 20 star-shaped rocks flying at you at Mach 5.3.

I wish I could vent to someone.

Granted. Law enforcement.

I wish I could catch a fish.

Granted. It's a great-white shark that eats you.

I wish I had a better, non-sentient, internet-accessible computer.

Granted. Due to its non-sentience, it is not able to respond to internet signals or you trying to use it.

I wish for lore more.

Granted. The MyLittlePony story gets incorporated into KSP canon. Rockets now have rainbow exhaust.

I wish for the weekend to arrive sooner.
